lead_paragraph: Golf's major championships threw their support behind the sport's return to the Olympics on Monday, offering exemptions for men's and women's gold medal winners this year to all grand slam events.

headline.print_headline: Olympic Gold Medal Winners to Get Major Exemptions
headline.main: Olympic Gold Medal Winners to Get Major Exemptions
